title: Sort Git Branches by Date
description: When working with Git, it's common to have multiple branches in a repository. However, it can be difficult to keep track of all the branches and their last commit dates. In this challenge, you will learn how to use Git to sort branches by date, making it easier to manage your repository.

meta.title: Git Branch Management | Sort Branches by Date
meta.description: Learn how to use Git to sort branches by date, making it easier to manage your repository and identify recently updated branches.
meta.keywords: Git, branch management, sort branches, date, repository management

verify.name: Verify for successful sorting
